GS40yraspriu:65: adhyāye'tra nidarśitāni sakalānyevaṃ hi karmāṇi vai YRps_7.66d

GS40yraspriu:407: karamitā sukṛtāpi hi cuhlikā hy YRps_3.32c
GS40yraspriu:415: karkaśaṃ ca laghu cippaṭaṃ sadā YRps_7.50a
GS40yraspriu:417: karṇamalaṃ mahiṣīṇāṃ strīdugdhaṃ ṭaṃkaṇena sammiśram YRps_1.134/a

GS40yraspriu:475: kāntyā yuktaṃ kārṣṇyagarbhaṃ ca nīlaṃ YRps_7.41e
GS40yraspriu:480: kāmasya bodhaṃ kurute hi śīghraṃ YRps_12.13e
GS40yraspriu:508: kāsaṃ śvāsaṃ vahnimāṃdyaṃ kṣayaṃ ca YRps_7.10a

GS40yraspriu:564: kuru viṣaṃ viniveśaya tatra vai YRps_3.7d
GS40yraspriu:571: kurvantu kāmukajanāḥ pratiruddhapātāścetāṃsi tāni cakitāni kalāvatīnām

GS40yraspriu:633: kaulatthe vai kvāthyamānaṃ hi vajram YRps_7.55d

GS40yraspriu:663: kṣāreṇa sarveṇa hi vidrumaṃ ca YRps_7.55a
GS40yraspriu:676: kṣiptvā nirundhyāpi ca mūṣikāyāṃ puṭānyathāṣṭau ca vanopalairdadet
GS40yraspriu:729: khyātaṃ sadbhiḥ saptadhā vidrumaṃ ca YRps_7.11c
GS40yraspriu:875: grantho'yaṃ grathitaḥ karotu satataṃ saukhyaṃ satāṃ mānase YRps_13.15d
GS40yraspriu:967: cārdhaṃ śubhraṃ graṃthilaṃ mauktikaṃ ca YRps_7.9b
GS40yraspriu:1182: tat kṛṣṇapītaṃ bhavatīva recanaṃ tṛtīyamāhurvibudhā bhiṣagvarāḥ
GS40yraspriu:1188: tatputreṇa yaśodhareṇa kavinā graṃthaḥ svayaṃ nirmitaḥ YRps_13.16d
GS40yraspriu:1245: tadanu vahnimadhaḥ kuru vai dṛḍhaṃ YRps_3.33c
GS40yraspriu:1254: tadā bhaveyuḥ khalu siddhatā yadā YRps_7.64a
GS40yraspriu:1268: tadvat puṣpamathāñjanaṃ tadanu cennīlāṃjanaṃ kathyate YRps_6.22b
GS40yraspriu:1307: tasyās tv adhordhvaṃ pradadīta gomayaṃ śītīkṛtā gavyaghṛtena bharjitā YRps_3.57/a
GS40yraspriu:1432: tebhyaścaiva hi satvapātanamatho samyagdruteḥ pātanam YRps_7.66b
GS40yraspriu:1435: teṣāṃ ca śuddhiṃ śṛṇu bhairavoktāṃ YRps_7.54a

GS40yraspriu:1493: tvakpatrakailāḥ saha kesareṇa palapramāṇā hi tato vidadhyāt YRps_12.10/b
GS40yraspriu:1498: dattvā gharme trīṇi cātho puṭāni YRps_8.28c

GS40yraspriu:1527: dāne śastaṃ bhakṣaṇe dhāraṇe ca YRps_7.14d
GS40yraspriu:1531: dāhe kṛcchre dīpanaṃ pācanaṃ ca YRps_7.19c

GS40yraspriu:1771: naraśca nārī ca tathā tṛtīyaṃ YRps_7.20c
GS40yraspriu:1839: nijahṛdi ca sukaṇṭhe dhārayiṣyanti tajjñāḥ YRps_2.109d
GS40yraspriu:1895: nīlajvālāvīrudhaḥ kandakeṣu ghṛṣṭaṃ gharme śoṣitaṃ bhasmabhāvam
GS40yraspriu:1908: netravyādhau śodhane ropaṇe ca śreṣṭhaṃ proktaṃ karṇarogapraśāṃtyai
GS40yraspriu:1910: netryaṃ hidhmarujāpahaṃ nigaditaṃ srotoṃjanaṃ sarvadā YRps_6.24d
GS40yraspriu:1913: neṣṭaṃ sadbhir bhakṣaṇe dhāraṇe ca YRps_7.12d
GS40yraspriu:1917: no sevyaṃ tannaiva deyaṃ dvijebhyaḥ YRps_7.18d
GS40yraspriu:1922: pakvamūṣā kulālabhāṇḍarūpā yā dṛḍhā ca paripācitā YRps_10.25/a
GS40yraspriu:2026: pācyaṃ hema ca raktagairikasamaṃ saṃjāyate niścitam YRps_4.17d
GS40yraspriu:2156: puṣpākhyaṃ hyaparaṃ guṇaiśca sahitaṃ sevyaṃ sadā rogahṛt YRps_6.62d
GS40yraspriu:2191: postakaṃ palamekaṃ vai śuṃṭhīkarṣaḥ sitā palaikā ca YRps_13.14/a
GS40yraspriu:2205: pratirasaṃ ca viśoṣya hi bhakṣayed YRps_3.64a
GS40yraspriu:2244: prānte tasya parā gatirhi niyataṃ satyaṃ śivenoditam YRps_3.65d
GS40yraspriu:2283: balivasāṃ ca samāṃ kuru tadbhiṣak YRps_3.19d
GS40yraspriu:2342: bhavati gadagaṇānāṃ nāśanaṃ yena sadyo YRps_8.1a
GS40yraspriu:2370: bhāgaṃ vimardyātha mṛtaṃ hi vajram YRps_7.37b
GS40yraspriu:2551: mārīcaṃ ceṭ ṭaṃkaṇaṃ hiṃgulaṃ ca YRps_8.34a
GS40yraspriu:2553: mārkaṇḍī ca karīrī ca hy YRps_9.7a
GS40yraspriu:2557: māṣadvayonmitamamuṃ niśi bhakṣayitvā mṛṣṭaṃ payastadanu māhiṣamāśu pīt
GS40yraspriu:2705: yathā hi doṣasya vināśanaṃ syāt YRps_7.54b
GS40yraspriu:2725: yaḥ kṛṣṇavarṇaḥ sa tu durlabho'sti YRps_6.32a

GS40yraspriu:2775: yojyaṃ tacca strīṣu puṃsveva ṣaṇḍhe YRps_7.25b
GS40yraspriu:2811: ratnānāṃ kramato guṇāśca kathitāstacchodhanaṃ māraṇaṃ YRps_7.66a
GS40yraspriu:2893: rase'tha ca cakrikāṃ kuryādrasakasya palonmitām YRps_11.58/b
GS40yraspriu:2929: rājñāṃ gṛhe te'pi bhavanti pūjyāḥ YRps_2.108d

GS40yraspriu:2956: rūpyaṃ hi miśraṃ khalu doṣalaṃ ca YRps_4.24b

GS40yraspriu:3025: loke kīrtiparaṃparāṃ vitanute dharme matirjāyate YRps_3.65c
GS40yraspriu:3089: vajrāṇi sarvāṇi mṛtībhavanti tadbhasmakaṃ vāritaraṃ bhavecca YRps_7.31/a

GS40yraspriu:3116: varṇena sā ratnanibhā ca kāntyā YRps_7.63a
GS40yraspriu:3120: varṇyaṃ vātavināśanaṃ kṛmiharaṃ dārvyudbhavaṃ śobhanam YRps_6.24b
GS40yraspriu:3149: vastreṇa saṃveṣṭya tataḥ prayatnād dolākhyayaṃtre'tha niveśya golakam YRps_7.61/a
GS40yraspriu:3151: vastre lagnā tu yā piṣṭī YRps_11.25a
GS40yraspriu:3167: vahniṃ śīte karṣamātraṃ viṣaṃ hi YRps_8.28b
GS40yraspriu:3171: vaṃgaṃ tālakamabhrakaṃ śaśirasaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ viṣaṃ ṭaṃkaṇaṃ YRps_11.89/a
GS40yraspriu:3188: vārān śataṃ cāpi tato dhamettaṃ saṃmarditaṃ śodhitapāradena YRps_7.30/b
GS40yraspriu:3217: vicchāyaṃ vā cippiṭaṃ niṣprabhaṃ ca YRps_7.47a
GS40yraspriu:3347: vyatyāsādvai naiva dattaṃ phalaṃ tad YRps_7.25c
GS40yraspriu:3448: śuddhaṃ rūpyaṃ ṣoḍaśākhyaṃ hi samyak YRps_11.123e
GS40yraspriu:3450: śuddhaṃ śulvaṃ gaṃdhakaṃ vai samāṃśaṃ YRps_4.51a
GS40yraspriu:3453: śuddhaṃ sūtaṃ gaṃdhakaṃ vai samāṃśaṃ YRps_8.27a
GS40yraspriu:3454: śuddhaṃ sūtaṃ bhāgamekaṃ tu tālād YRps_8.21a
GS40yraspriu:3500: śophaṃ śūlaṃ jūrtirogaṃ viṣaṃ ca YRps_7.16a
GS40yraspriu:3506: śyāmābhaśubhraṃ ca guru sphuṭaṃ vā YRps_7.49b

GS40yraspriu:3637: sadyaḥ prāṇavivardhanaṃ jvaraharaṃ sevyaṃ sadā cābhrakam YRps_5.27d
GS40yraspriu:3756: sarvāmlayukte tuṣavāripūrite pātraṃ dṛḍhe mṛṇmayasaṃjñake hi YRps_7.61/b
GS40yraspriu:3763: sarveṣāṃ hi parīkṣaṇaṃ ca drutayaḥ sammelanaṃ vai rase YRps_7.66c
GS40yraspriu:3777: saha jalena vimṛdya ca yāmakaṃ YRps_3.7a

GS40yraspriu:3870: sīsena sārdhaṃ rajataṃ tu dhmāpayet YRps_4.24d
GS40yraspriu:3884: supācitaṃ vai mṛduvahninā tathā darvīpralepo'pi hi jāyate yathā

GS40yraspriu:4011: sauvīrākhyaṃ cāṃjanaṃ dhūmavarṇaṃ pittāsraghnaṃ chardihidhmāvraṇaghnam YRps_6.23/a
GS40yraspriu:4015: strī pumān no strī pumān yacca vajraṃ YRps_7.25a
GS40yraspriu:4018: sthagaya taṃ ca pidhānavareṇa vai YRps_3.24c
